General.Name: Youyou Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: YouYou Foods Co., Ltd. provides food products in China. It offers pickled chicken paw, seafoods, Chinese tradition spiced marinated, chewy crystal series, vegetable series, and fermented soya bean sauce series products, as well as bamboo shoots, dried tofu, peanut, pig skin crystals, and other food products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Yubei, China.
